H0.text: where did aeneas go when he left carthage. Italy

H1.text: where did aeneas go when he left carthage. Corsica

H2.text: where did aeneas go when he left carthage. Sardinia

H3.text: where did aeneas go when he left carthage. Sicily

A4.text: After the sojourn in Carthage, the Trojans returned to Sicily where Aeneas organized funeral games to honor his father, who had died a year before.

A5.text: The company traveled on and landed on the western coast of Italy.

A6.text: Heading into the open sea, Aeneas leaves Buthrotum, rounds the south eastern tip of Italy and makes his way towards Sicily (Trinacria).
